div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1425 Pamphylia ?, 1964 Burial: c. 230 B.C. Contents: c. 30 AR Alexander III: c. 15 post. tetradr. Lysimachus: 2 lifetime tetradr. (Amphi- polis 1, Lampsacus 1) c. 10 post. tetradr. Eumenes I: 1 tetradr. Antiochus I: 2 tetradr. (Seleuceia ad Tigrim 1, Tarsus 1) Antiochus Hierax: T tetradr. (Alexandreia Troas) Disposition: dispersed Boehringer, Zur Chronologie, p. 152, illus.
